name: BOMBER ZONE
description:
It's a basic prototype recréation/remake of ROBOWARRIOR (nes) but in 3D in gamemaker.

There is items to use (in the inventory when you push enter), like the candle to put light in the underworld area, batterie to restore energy, boots to increase speed, bombs etc....

There is one level, one item shop, one secret room, and one boss.

Use WASD to move, K to use bomb, L to use gun, Enter to open/close inventory, R to restart game.

Music from : https://pixabay.com/fr/users/lesiakower-25701529/
